name: Supernova (itch) (Mr-Jack)
description:
Humanity is on the verge of extinction.

The Sun, its oldest ally, is fading away.

Its mass is reaching a critical level.
And the Sun is now collapsing on itself.

We are now certain that after reaching the "point of no return"
it will transform into a Supernova and erase our entire Solar System.

Humanity is fleeing aboard spaceships but it will take time.
You need to delay the inevitable!
